name: Tingfeng Jao
story: Xiang Le grew up in a rural village in China. His parents were farmers and he spent much of his childhood helping them with their work. Despite his young age, Xiang always had a strong sense of leadership and would often take charge when working with his peers on tasks. When he was old enough, Xiang enlisted in the Chinese military and quickly proved himself to be a skilled and dedicated soldier. He was recruited into the OPFOR faction and rose through the ranks to become a sergeant and team leader.
